column4: The forums are terrible... they keep logging me out in either browser
Its enough to make getting support really difficult
I been using Ubuntu since 8.04 and I really feel like abandoning it now
have you made a new user to test if your settings are bad?
its just to test, why is that funny?
Just funny because I feel like I am jumping through hoops to configure an IP address
are you wanting to use static IP?
should do, are you configuring it right?
if you can pastebin the interfaces file, we can advise.
you forgot to add:  auto eth0
echo "auto eth0" | sudo tee -a /etc/network/interfaces > /dev/null
could use the locate command after running:  sudo updatedb'
minus the apostrophe
yes
sudo updatedb; locate pg_hba.conf
echo "text to add" | tee -a `sudo updatedb; locate pg_hba.conf`
your losing me with the updatedb part, not sure what that means
it updates a database of every file in the filesystem
updatedb makes finding files fast
the downside to it is that chages are not recorded so you need to run updatedb for searches to be accurate
Thanks I didnt know about that
What was the tee ?
its to add to the file. I thought you wanted to find the filename and add some text to it
